author: breser
msg: Make our execute-perm set interface more conservative.  This is
primarily so svn:executable will no longer add execute permissions
where there had not already been read permissions.
(svn_io_set_file_executable): Only set the +x for users, groups, or the
world if they already have read permissions on OSes with unix style
Update the documentation to match the change.
